name: migunani-motor-project
description: Migunani Motor - Sistema Omnichannel dengan WhatsApp Integration

scripts.dev:frontend:wait: bash -lc 'until (echo > /dev/tcp/127.0.0.1/5000) >/dev/null 2>&1; do echo "[wait] backend belum siap di :5000"; sleep 1; done; npm run dev:frontend'
scripts.docker:seed: bash -lc 'docker compose stop back_end >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; docker compose --profile seed run --rm seed; docker compose up -d back_end'
scripts.docker:bootstrap: bash -lc 'docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d mysql && docker compose --profile seed run --rm seed && docker compose up -d back_end front_end'
scripts.start: npm run docker:up && npm run dev

author: Migunani Motor
